splashScreen.heading: Welcome to the Suredbits Wallet
splashScreen.significantValue: Please do not use it with significant amounts of value at this time.

buildAcceptOffer.invalidHex: The hex string entered is not valid hex
buildAcceptOffer.invalidAnnouncementContractInfoHex: The entered hex string is not an Announcement or ContractInfo
buildAcceptOffer.invalidOfferHex: The entered hex string is not an Offer

buildAcceptOfferDescription.buildOffer: Start a new Offer from an Announcement or Contract Info

newOfferDescription.outcomes: Payout values are to you, in sats, for the outcome
newOfferDescription.refundDate: When the contract can be refunded
newOfferDescription.createOffer: Create this DLC Offer in your wallet and reserve funds.
newOfferDescription.createOffer2: You will send the hex string representing your offer in Result below to your counterparty along with your Tor DLC Host Address to complete the contract.

newOfferValidation.yourCollateralMustBeLessThanMax: Your Collateral ({{yourCollateral}} sats) must be equal to the maximum payout ({{maxCollateral}} sats) or less
newOfferValidation.maxCollateral: Your Collateral is greater than the maximum payout

acceptOffer.heading: Offer Details
acceptOffer.peerAddressInvalid: The tor address entered is not valid, cannot complete the DLC process

acceptOfferDescription.acceptOffer: If everything in the offer appears correct, you can complete the DLC contract by exchanging signatures with your counterparty. The exchange can be done over Tor or with saved files.
acceptOfferDescription.peerAddress: Tor DLC Host Address of the person you'd like to complete the contract with. Putting an address in here will attempt to complete the remaining contract steps online.
acceptOfferDescription.filename: Filename to save Accepted DLC Offer to

acceptOfferType.tor: Use Tor to pass messages. Your counterparty needs to be online and have a Tor DLC Host Address they will share with you.
acceptOfferType.files: Exchange files to pass messages. You will send the saved file to your counterparty.

contractDetailDescription.signAcceptOffer: Your counterparty has accepted your Offer. Sign their Accept by clicking Execute and send the saved file back to your counterparty.
contractDetailDescription.broadcastSigned: Your counterparty has signed your Offer. Countersign and broadcast the DLC to finalize it by clicking Execute.
contractDetailDescription.filename: Filename to save Signed DLC Accept into
contractDetailDescription.cannotSignOwnAccept: You cannot sign your own Accepted DLC. You must give it to your counterparty to sign.
contractDetailDescription.cannotBroadcastOwnSign: You cannot broadcast your own Signed DLC. You must give it to your counterparty for broadcast.

dlcFile.heading: DLC File Operations
dlcFile.chooseOffer: Choose Offer DLC File to Accept
dlcFile.chooseAccept: Choose Accepted DLC File to Sign
dlcFile.chooseSign: Choose Signed DLC File to Broadcast

dlcFileDescription.accept: Select file to open and accept. This file should be a DLC in Offered state.
dlcFileDescription.sign: Select file to open and sign. This file should be a DLC in Accepted state.
dlcFileDescription.broadcast: Select file to open and broadcast. This file should be a DLC in Signed state.

sendFundsSuccess.title: Funds Sent
sendFundsSuccess.content: {{ amount }} sats sent to {{ address }}. The transactionId is {{ txId }} and should appear in the mempool shortly.
sendFundsSuccess.linksContent: View the transaction on Mempool.space at

cancelContractSuccess.title: Contract Canceled
cancelContractSuccess.content: Contract with id {{ contractId }} has been canceled. The transactionId is {{ txId }} and should appear in the mempool shortly.
cancelContractSuccess.linksContent: View the transaction on Mempool.space at

rebroadcastSuccess.title: Rebroadcast Successful
rebroadcastSuccess.content: The transaction with id {{ txId }} was rebroadcast.
rebroadcastSuccess.linksContent: View the transaction on Mempool.space at

dlcNotFound.title: DLC not found in wallet
dlcNotFound.content: No DLC with matching contract id could be found

decodingDLCError.title: Error decoding DLC
decodingDLCError.content: There was an error decoding the selected file. Please make sure it is a DLC in {{ state }} state.

invalidHexError.title: Error processing file
invalidHexError.content: The file content is not valid hex
